components.css_content: body { margin: 0; padding: 0; width: 1080px; height: 1080px; overflow: hidden; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: black; position: relative; color: white; } body::before { content: ""; position: absolute; inset: 0; background-image: url('${bg_image_url}'); background-size: cover; background-position: center; opacity: 0.64; z-index: 0; } .blur-box { position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; width: 700px; height: 700px; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); border-radius: 40px; padding: 60px; overflow: hidden; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12); backdrop-filter: blur(30px); -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(30px); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25); display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: space-between; z-index: 1; } .header { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; font-size: 34px; } .header span:first-child { text-transform: lowercase; font-size: 60px; font-weight: bold; } .title { font-size: 160px; line-height: 0.85; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 40px; } .subtitle { font-size: 42px; opacity: 0.9; } .footer { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; font-size: 28px; opacity: 0.85; } .footer img { height: 30px; } ${custom_css}
